target: Your total is 76.80 GBP, which you can pay at the station. Your Reference number is : 708IJWEK .
context: <user>  I am organizing my trip to cambridge and need a place to stay in the east in the cheap price range. <system>  I have 3 cheap hotels in the east for you to choose from. There are all good Hotels with free internet and parking though allenbell is closest to cambridge. <user>  I would prefer a hotel with 4 stars. Does Allenbell fit the bill? <system>  Yes it does would you like me to make a booking? <user>  No but I'd like to know where it's exactly located. <system>  Allenbell is located at 517a coldham lane with a postcode of cb13js. <user>  I also need a train going to stevenage. <system>  Okay! What day would you like to travel? I'm presuming you're coming from Cambridge?<user>  I would like to travel on Thursday leaving from Cambridge. <system>  I have 10 trains that will be leaving Cambridge going to Stevenage on Thursday. What time would you like to leave or arrive?<user>  The train should arrive by 19:30 the latest. <system>  The closest to 19:30 without being after is TR 4765, they arrive at 18:10, does that work for you?<user>  That will give me time to find my way, in case I get lost, so that's fine. I'll need you to book 6 tickets, please. <system>
